summary: Iteration 7 - Frontend UI/UX update testing completed. All 8 features verified and working correctly. Icons replaced with Lucide icons, About page updated with new founder narrative, spacing tightened.
context_for_next_testing_agent: UI/UX updates verified: Lucide icons throughout homepage, Monitor icon in How It Works, updated About page narrative, tighter spacing

stats_bar_lucide_icons.notes: All 4 Lucide icons visible in stats bar (10,000+ Lessons, 2,500+ Churches, 66 Books, < 2 min)

features_section_lucide_icons.notes: Features section uses Lucide icons instead of emojis for: Scripture-Centered, Age-Appropriate, Creative Activities, Ready in Minutes, Print & Share, Fully Customizable

how_it_works_monitor_icon.notes: Robot emoji successfully replaced with Monitor/computer Lucide icon for step 02 'Your Lesson Is Generated'

team_collaboration_lucide_icons.notes: All Team Roles and Key Features use Lucide icons

verified_content.title: Our Founders
verified_content.subtitle: US Navy Veteran & Son
verified_content.25_years_experience: With 25 years of experience building software solutions
verified_content.mother_reference: inspired by his mother one day while she prepared her Sunday bible study
verified_content.son_reference: Together with the help of his business partner and son

about_page_founder_narrative.notes: About page displays updated founder narrative exactly as specified from PDF

navigation_links.notes: All navigation links present and functional

page_spacing_tightened.notes: Page uses tighter spacing (py-10 to py-16) more than loose spacing (py-20 to py-32). Spacing reduced from py-20/28 to py-12/16 as specified

lucide_icons_total.notes: 50 Lucide icons found on homepage, confirming modern single-color icon implementation

verification_summary.visual_verification: Screenshots confirm all UI/UX changes implemented correctly

code_review_notes.index_tsx: Homepage correctly imports and uses Lucide icons (BookOpen, Church, ScrollText, Zap, Target, Palette, RefreshCw, Printer, Search, Monitor, Pencil, GraduationCap, Mail, Settings, BarChart3, Shield, Star)
code_review_notes.about_tsx: About page contains complete founder narrative with anchor emoji icon for Navy veteran, 25 years experience, mother inspiration, and son collaboration mentioned
code_review_notes.__root_tsx: Navigation component includes all required links (Tutorials, Contact Us, Pricing) with correct routes
